channel.title: Compiler Help Right Here!
channel.description: Noticed lots of questions about this... if your compiler doesn't work... (probably mod tahrok's second one... didn't work for me...) Imput this into your compiler- [code]@echo off color 0a title Compiler "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" server pause[/code] There are others that work aswell but this is the easiest for me and requires the least amount of effort...[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 09:20:53 PM[/size][hr]PPL plz gimme feedback it makes me feel better to know i helped ppl TYVM! :)

item.title: Compiler Help Right Here!
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

Noticed lots of questions about this… if your compiler doesn’t work… (probably mod tahrok’s second one… didn’t work for me…)
Imput this into your compiler-

@echo off color 0a title Compiler "C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" server pause
There are others that work aswell but this is the easiest for me and requires the least amount of effort…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 09:20:53 PM[/size][hr]PPL plz gimme feedback it makes me feel better to know i helped ppl TYVM!

Read full topic
